data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ibb, Yemen.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ibb, Yemen

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Ibb, Yemen know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Ibb, Yemen to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ibb, Yemen. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, remember the Malay people. Make the Malay people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 536 believers in the state of Ibb.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Ibb prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Ibb, Yemen has a population of 2,560,000.

We estimate Ibb has 536 people who might know Jesus, 4,545 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,554,919 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4,776 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ibb, Yemen.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.
